/ projects

OMWAY

OMWAY is a student-centric transportation application designed specifically for students at UAM (Universidad Americana). Similar to popular ride-sharing platforms like Uber, OMWAY provides an efficient and convenient way for students to request and share rides within the university community.

Land Meter

A granulometric analysis system tailored for civil engineering students at the university. This innovative tool facilitates the precise measurement and analysis of soil particle sizes, crucial for various civil engineering projects such as foundation design, pavement construction, and slope stability assessment.

Cruz Verde

An inventory system I developed specifically for a pharmacy setting. This system streamlined inventory management processes, allowing for efficient tracking of pharmaceutical products, stock levels, and expiration dates.
